Plot: Security guard Ben must prove himself to his girlfriend's brother, top police officer James. He rides along James on a 24-hour patrol of Atlanta.
Title: Ride Along
Actors: Ice Cube, Kevin Hart, John Leguizamo, Bruce McGill
Writer: Greg Coolidge (screenplay), Jason Mantzoukas (screenplay), Phil Hay (screenplay), Matt Manfredi (screenplay), Greg Coolidge (story)
